dimDevice.description: Device information and attributes, including device type, manufacturer, model, and installation details.

columns.name: Device_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the device

columns.name: Device_Name
columns.description: Name of the device

columns.name: Device_Type
columns.description: Type of the device (e.g., modem, router, camera)

columns.name: Manufacturer
columns.description: Manufacturer of the device

columns.name: Model
columns.description: Model number of the device

columns.name: Firmware_Version
columns.description: Current firmware version of the device

columns.name: Connectivity_Type
columns.description: Type of connectivity the device uses (e.g., 5G, Wi-Fi, Ethernet)

columns.name: Installation_Location
columns.description: Physical location where the device is installed

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate of the device's installation location

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate of the device's installation location

columns.name: Indoor_Outdoor
columns.description: Whether the device is installed indoors or outdoors

columns.name: Installation_Date
columns.description: Date the device was installed

columns.name: Last_Reboot_Timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the device's last reboot

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Current status of the device (e.g., active, inactive, maintenance)

columns.name: Power_Source
columns.description: Source of power for the device (e.g., solar, electrical)

columns.name: Warranty_Expiry_Date
columns.description: Date the device's warranty expires

factConnectedDeviceReport.description: Report of connected devices, including data usage, signal strength, and link status.

columns.name: Report_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the report

columns.name: Device_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the device

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the report

columns.name: DL_Data_MB
columns.description: Downlink data usage in megabytes

columns.name: UL_Data_MB
columns.description: Uplink data usage in megabytes

columns.name: Signal_Strength_dBm
columns.description: Signal strength in decibels per milliwatt

columns.name: Min_Signal_Strength_dBm
columns.description: Minimum signal strength in decibels per milliwatt

columns.name: Max_Signal_Strength_dBm
columns.description: Maximum signal strength in decibels per milliwatt

columns.name: Avg_Signal_Strength_dBm
columns.description: Average signal strength in decibels per milliwatt

columns.name: Link_Status
columns.description: Status of the link (e.g., connected, disconnected)

columns.name: Avg_Latency_ms
columns.description: Average latency in milliseconds

columns.name: Jitter_ms
columns.description: Jitter in milliseconds

columns.name: Events_Triggered
columns.description: Number of events triggered

columns.name: Errors_Logged
columns.description: Number of errors logged

columns.name: Min_DL_Data_Rate_mbps
columns.description: Minimum downlink data rate in megabits per second

columns.name: Max_DL_Data_Rate_mbps
columns.description: Maximum downlink data rate in megabits per second

columns.name: Avg_DL_Data_Rate_mbps
columns.description: Average downlink data rate in megabits per second

columns.name: Min_UL_Data_Rate_mbps
columns.description: Minimum uplink data rate in megabits per second

columns.name: Max_UL_Data_Rate_mbps
columns.description: Maximum uplink data rate in megabits per second

columns.name: Avg_UL_Data_Rate_mbps
columns.description: Average uplink data rate in megabits per second
